name: Questionoftheday
0:
”Alexa, start question of the day”
”Alexa, open Question of the Day and begin”
”Alexa, open Question of the Day and personalize”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: question of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A fun interactive quiz game offering a customized player experience. 

You will be served one question per day and if answered correctly another one follows! Questions from 6 topics are available (Music, Cinema, Sports, History, Science and Celebrities), and more to come in the near future. You can personalize your experience by stating your preference for each question topic.

Test your knowledge with the Question of the day skill made for Alexa.

Please check rest of the skills developed by GU Group, as we specialize in the design and implementation of Alexa skills given our vast experience on helping companies build and manage intelligent technology solutions.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
